CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The current-density-voltage ( J-V ) characteristics of the devices under the illumination of simulated AM 1.5G conditions ( 100 mW / cm^2 ) are shown in Figure 4a and the parameters are summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| current-density-voltage (J-V) characteristics |
| devices |
| simulated AM 1.5G conditions |
| Figure 4a |
| Table 2 |

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. current-density-voltage (J-V) characteristics
2. devices
3. simulated AM 1.5G conditions
4. Figure 4a
5. Table 2

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| current-density-voltage (J-V) characteristics of devices |
| simulated AM 1.5G conditions |
| Figure 4a |
| Table 2 |

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. current-density-voltage (J-V) characteristics of devices
2. simulated AM 1.5G conditions
3. Figure 4a
4. Table 2

The entities "devices" refers to the specific material or substance that the J-V characteristics are being measured for, so it is considered a material name. The other entities are either figures, tables, or conditions under which the measurements were taken.
